sense.def:
To damage something
pomeni nekaj raniti ali poškodovati.

seg.quote: A fire had severely damaged part of the school.
Unofficial strikes were damaging the British economy.
The incident was damaging to his career and reputation.

sense.def:
Damage
je poškodba ali škoda, ki je nečemu povzročena.

seg.quote: It can cause lethal damage to the liver.
He could not repair the damage done to the party's credibility.

sense.def:
Kadar sodišče
awards damages to someone
, odredi, da tistemu človeku izplača denar nekdo, ki je oškodoval njegov ugled ali lastnino ali pa ga je poškodoval.
